1.content: You wake up one morning and find out that you have shrunk to 1inch you then stand up and look around then you relize you were in..______Room
1.title: Shrunk In Whos Room?

11.title: Usagi Tsukino

choices: stand there and get steped on
111.content: You wake up and look around you then saw a giant girl in her school uniform with white socks on she must be Usagi the sailor moon she was then walking toward you you had to react what are you going to do?
111.title: School Uniform?

choices: you scream don't step on me
1111.content: You had to react fast so you jumped into the over turned shoe that was laying on the floor but for some reason it little smell that bad only a little then a giant earthquake happend but it wasnt really and earthquake the shoe was being turned over you landed in the middle of the shoe you looked up and saw the face of_____ and then she begain entering her socked foot into the shoe
1111.title: Jump into her blac shoe

11111.content: Usagi look you and stop her sock foot, she him to it
11111.title: you scream don't step on me

111112.content: Continue with her wanting you to rub her feet or she picks you up
111112.title: OR!!!!

112.content: As you're getting up to see what just happened when that bright light went off blinding you while watching Sailor Moon(Yeah you're a guy who happens to like that show for some bizarre reason get over it!) you see a massive big red boot slam right next to you and look up with fear to the titanic girl with blond pig tails and the pretty complexion in the almost sailor outfit and a blue mini skirt does she see your tiny self or not?
112.title: Sailor Scout Uniform

1121.content: As you're waiting to be squashed by the sailor scout's big red boot she slowly lifts it and her oversized blue eyes spot you without saying a word Sailor Moon picks you up gently stuffing you in her
1121.title: Yes you're saved

12.content: One more question is she dressed in...
12.title: Chibi-usa

choices: jump into a pile of clothes
stand there scared and get steped on
121.content: You wake up and look around you then saw a giant girl in her school uniform with white socks on she must be chibi usa the youngest of the sailor scouts she was then walking toward you you had to react what are you going to do?
121.title: School Uniform?

1211.content: You had to react fast so you jumped into the over turned shoe that was laying on the floor but for soem reason it did't smell that bad only a little then a giant earthquake happend but it wasnt really and earthquake the shoe was being turned over you landed in the middle of the shoe you looked up and saw the face of_____ and then she begain entering her socked foot into the shoe
1211.title: Jump into her shoe

choices: Usagi began to run to school!
She slipped the shoes off for some reason!
12111.content:
She rolled her eyes and said "There's no way my feet will fit her shoes." before slipping the shoes on.

"Oh.. Jeez, Chibiusa has some big feet.. But she has good taste in shoes~" She said, modeling them for herself.

"But they fit.. Pretty good!" She said, with a laugh. "Guess I'll just take her old shoes since she outgrew them."

You had to cringe as you imagined just how big Chibiusa's feet are, if Usagi's are this huge for you..

And Usagi's feet weren't small, even for her size! You weren't sure which you'd rather..

Chibiusa's even bigger feet..

Or the feet of Usagi..

You didn't have much choice.
12111.title: Usagi Tsukino

12112.content: Chibiusa struggles to get her shoe on, saying "I really have to tell Usagi I need new shoes!" before getting them on, pressing you against her soft sole, she didn't have time to put socks on so you were trapped against her bare soles. When is the next time she takes them off?
12112.title: Chibi-usa

121122.content: How about when she transforms into chibi sailor moon due to a youma attack during school (and you might end up in her sailor scout shoes while she is fighting instead)
121122.title: Sooner!

choices: A Soft, And Moving Floor (A Part Of her Body)
14.content: "W-W-W-What the..." You ask yourself as you awaken to find yourself on the _____ of the room...
14.title: Ami Mizuno

145.content: What part of her body?
145.title: A Soft, And Moving Floor (A Part Of her Body)

1451.content: Last question before we begin...
1451.title: Stomach

14511.content: As you look around, all you find out is that you are somehow SUPER small, and in some sort of bedroom. "Oh, you're finally awake!" A loud booming female voice says. The floor beneath you shook as you heard the voice. You place your hands down to keep balanced, but upon feeling this 'ground' you realize that it was somewhat squishy... You look behind you swiftly, and see the giant smiling face of Ami from Sailor Moon, and you nearly faint. "I'm so glad to see you're alright! It's been a while since I've had...
14511.title: On Ami

145112.content:
You were shocked, but at the same time mesmerized by her beauty, so you answered, "I will do anything for you".

"Good ". said Ami.

Then I want to you
145112.title: ...a servant..."

choices: Your mistress givse you a different task
1451121.content:
"As you wish, Ami.". She smiled, and then she picked you up and placed you between her big toe and her second toe. The smell wasn't bad.

You keep rubbing every toe. Every toe was 50 times your size, so it took you one hour to rub her big toe only.

"Good job my little servant, move to the next toe please." said your mistress.

You keep rubbing her toes until
1451121.title: Rub my feet

14511211.content:
"Good job my servant", said your mistress, then she picked you up.

"Now I want to you to..."
14511211.title: Your mistress gives you a different task

choices: Ami's getting up to get somthing to eat
Ami realizes your in her stomach
14512.content: You awake to see nothing but pitch blackness and growling. Your eyes soon adjust to the darkness not knowing your inside Ami's stomach to you it's like a cave. *Is this some kind of cave?* You think to yourself then eveything starts to shake and you hear the growling sound again followed by a voice
14512.title: Inside

choices: happy and wants you to say inside
concerned and tries to get you out
145122.content:
"Oh, there's someone inside my stomach". she said.

She was
145122.title: Ami realizes your in her stomach

1451221.content: Do you digest, or do you live?
1451221.title: happy and wants you to say inside

choices: Usagi but she was not there but Luna there
You word not inside room but outside where Artemis
You word in one of enemies room
